Text:
Well, lets give it a shot...

Have not seen it, but thanks for hunting down an oddity.

A surprisingly good movie, especially considering its age. An absorbing and daring plot and excellent acting in the main roles, including Linda Hayden who was just 15 at the time. Admittedly I think she's gorgeous, but honestly her acting talent really shows here. Shame about the very poor video quality but still worth watching.
